text:
What is up? Are you ready for some fun? 
Well, let's improve our English vocabulary,

pronunciation, grammar and so much 
more with Avatar: The Last Airbender.

But quickly, before we get into today's lesson, 
I want to let you know that if you're new here,

every week we help you to understand fast speaking 
natives. Without getting lost, without misleading

jokes and without subtitles. Just like Jakub, 
who says that he can't remember the last time

that he laughed so much learning English. So if 
you want to have a lot of fun and improve your

English a ton too, it's really simple: just hit 
that Subscribe button and the Bell down below,

so you don't miss a single one of our new videos. 
Now, let's jump into today's lesson. Aww yeah!

Hey guys, just a quick interruption. Would 
you like to be able to understand natives

even when we speak really fast? Then I 
highly recommend that you join our FREE

Masterclass, where we will teach you the 
3 keys to be able to understand natives,

no matter how fast we speak. You can 
learn more and sign up by clicking up here

or down in the description below. I 
look forward to seeing you inside!

Hey, are you an anime fan? Well 
then I highly recommend that you

check out this lesson with one of 
my favorites: Dragon Ball Z. So,

you can find that by clicking up here or down 
description below after you finish this lesson.
